title: Spack adds empty lines into `spack.yaml` files

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
<!-- Explain, in a clear and concise way, the command you ran and the result you were trying to achieve.
Example: "I ran `spack find` to list all the installed packages and ..." -->

When I run `spack compiler find` with an active environment, Spack modifies the respective `spack.yaml` file, rewriting the compiler information in there. The newly written file adds one emtpy line in front of every comment. After several iterations of this, the long stretches of empty lines become annoying.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack --env-dir utils/spack/redshift compiler find view-compilers
```

### Error Message

<!-- If Spack reported an error, provide the error message. If it did not report an error but the output appears incorrect, provide the incorrect output. If there was no error message and no output but the result is incorrect, describe how it does not match what you expect. -->


`spack.yaml` before:
```yaml
# source ../spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
# spack --env-dir utils/spack/redshift compiler find view-compilers && spack --env-dir utils/spack/redshift concretize --force && spack --env-dir utils/spack/redshift install --fail-fast
spack:
  definitions:
  - compilers:
    - gcc @11.1.0
  - packages:
    # +shared does not work on MacOS
    # - amrex ~fortran +hdf5 +openmp +particles +shared
    - amrex ~fortran +hdf5 +openmp +particles
    - boost cxxstd=17 +mpi
    - fftw +mpi +openmp
    - googletest
    - gsl
    - hdf5 @1.10.7 +cxx +fortran +hl +mpi +threadsafe
    - hwloc
    - jemalloc
    - jpeg
    - nsimd simd=AVX2
    - openblas
    - openmpi +thread_multiple
    - openssl
    # - silo @4.10.2-bsd ~fortran
    - silo @4.10.2-bsd ~fortran ~pic ~shared
    - simulationio ~python
    - ssht
    - yaml-cpp
    - zlib
  specs:
  - matrix:
    - [$%compilers]
    - [$packages]
  - cmake %apple-clang @12.0.5
  - python %apple-clang @12.0.5
  concretization: together
  view: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view
  compilers:
  - compiler:
      spec: gcc@11.1.0
      paths:
        cc: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/gcc
        cxx: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/g++
        f77: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/gfortran
        fc: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/gfortran
      flags: {}
      operating_system: bigsur
      target: x86_64
      modules: []
      environment: {}
      extra_rpaths: []
  - compiler:
      spec: clang@11.1.0
      paths:
        cc: null
        cxx: null
        f77: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/gfortran
        fc: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/gfortran
      flags: {}
      operating_system: bigsur
      target: x86_64
      modules: []
      environment: {}
      extra_rpaths: []
```

The same file after:
```yaml
# source ../spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
# spack --env-dir utils/spack/redshift compiler find view-compilers && spack --env-dir utils/spack/redshift concretize --force && spack --env-dir utils/spack/redshift install --fail-fast
spack:
  definitions:
  - compilers:
    - gcc @11.1.0
  - packages:

    # +shared does not work on MacOS
    # - amrex ~fortran +hdf5 +openmp +particles +shared
    - amrex ~fortran +hdf5 +openmp +particles
    - boost cxxstd=17 +mpi
    - fftw +mpi +openmp
    - googletest
    - gsl
    - hdf5 @1.10.7 +cxx +fortran +hl +mpi +threadsafe
    - hwloc
    - jemalloc
    - jpeg
    - nsimd simd=AVX2
    - openblas
    - openmpi +thread_multiple
    - openssl

    # - silo @4.10.2-bsd ~fortran
    - silo @4.10.2-bsd ~fortran ~pic ~shared
    - simulationio ~python
    - ssht
    - yaml-cpp
    - zlib
  specs:
  - matrix:
    - [$%compilers]
    - [$packages]
  - cmake %apple-clang @12.0.5
  - python %apple-clang @12.0.5
  concretization: together
  view: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view
  compilers:
  - compiler:
      spec: gcc@11.1.0
      paths:
        cc: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/gcc
        cxx: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/g++
        f77: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/gfortran
        fc: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/gfortran
      flags: {}
      operating_system: bigsur
      target: x86_64
      modules: []
      environment: {}
      extra_rpaths: []
  - compiler:
      spec: clang@11.1.0
      paths:
        cc: null
        cxx: null
        f77: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/gfortran
        fc: /Users/eschnett/src/CarpetX/Cactus/view-compilers/bin/gfortran
      flags: {}
      operating_system: bigsur
      target: x86_64
      modules: []
      environment: {}
      extra_rpaths: []
```

Note the additional empty lines.
